c74object.name: o.chordidentifier
c74object.description: Check if an input (chord) list containing pitch numbers in virtual pitch format (from 0 to 11) is equal to any of the prestored chord items in the "chords-collection.json" file.

inlet.description: Give a chord to identify from a stored list of musical chords. The input note must be in virtual pitch format (from 0 to 11, corresponding to all chromatic notes).

outlet.description: If a chord has been successfully identified it will be output through this outlet. But if there is no match between the input chord and the stored chord list, o.chordidentifier will output "-1".

If a chord has been successfully identified, the chord name will be sent through this outlet. But if there is no match between the input chord and the stored chord list, o.chordidentifier will output ""no-match"".

method.name: list
method.description: Takes the input chord and checks if it is recognized from a list of stored chords. This prestored list is a file called "chords-collection.json" and must be loaded into a dict object named "chords-dict", for o.chordidentifier to read from it.

attribute.name: defer
attribute.description:
"0": execute on high-priority thread.
"1": execute on low-priority thread. (default = 0)

entry.name: symbol
entry.description: Out right outlet: chord name. If there is no match o.chordidentifier will output "no-match".

entry.name: list
entry.description: Out left outlet: chord notes in virtual pitch format from "0" (C) to "11" (B).

entry.name: int
entry.description: Out left outlet: sends "-1" if there is no match.
